item.title: Enhancing Urban Visual Place Recognition for Crowdsourced Flood Imagery via LLM-Guided Attention
item.description: arXiv:2512.11811v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Crowdsourced street-view imagery from social media provides valuable real-time visual evidence of urban flooding and other crisis events, yet it often lacks reliable geographic metadata for emergency response. item.title: Log Anomaly Detection with Large Language Models via Knowledge-Enriched Fusion
item.description: arXiv:2512.11997v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: System logs are a critical resource for monitoring and managing distributed systems, providing insights into failures and anomalous behavior. item.title: KAG - KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.
item.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs. It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> GitHub | <strong>Keywords:</strong> reasoning, LLM, framework, vector, knowledge base | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
